name: Pluto Rim: Storm Commander
summary: Pluto Rim: Storm Commander is a space-themed free-to-play war strategy game. Battle alien fleets and survivors to protect your empire against the upcoming space war. Team up with friends from around the world to build an alliance, increase your alien defense strategy and participate in special events. Take part in brutal alien warfare and build a powerful fleet to grow your empire – surviving the apocalypse is in your hands in Pluto Rim: Storm Commander!
